name: Noelani
text: ʻO ke kila kila ka ʻano hana a i ʻole ke ʻano o ka hoʻokani ʻana i ka mea kani. Kūkulu ʻia i Hawaii e Joseph Kekuku i ka hopena o ke kenekulia 19 a me ka makahiki ma mua o ke kenekulia 19, kahi kelepa pōkole i hana pinepine ʻia i kahi kila; Hōʻī ʻia nā kaula me ka lima hoʻokahi, ʻoiai e hoʻoliʻiliʻi ka lima ʻē aʻe o ke aniani o hoʻokahi a i ʻole kekahi keʻa me ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka pahu a i ʻole kaomi i kapa ʻia he kila (ua hana ʻia ka mea metala, akā, he aniani a i nā mea ʻē aʻe).
alt: Uke sitting inspiringly in the sun

name: Gabe
text: Best lessons ever, they were all better than Cats
alt: Dashing fellow who who looks like he sounds like Chet Atkins when playing guitar

name: Midge
text: I used to sing alto-meow, now I sing al-TO-meee-OOooWW! All the tom-cats notice; now I get more than I can handle!
